description: Name of treatment; Burn = prescribed burn; Thin = mechanical thining; Burn+Thin = both prescribed burn and mechancial thin; Control = control.
Average stem density of trees with DBH >= 15cm in treated units during the final year of measurement.
Standard error of average stem density  in the final year of measurement.
Average percent difference between treatment unit and control unit stem density in the final year of measurement.
Standard error of average percent difference between treatment and control in the final year of measurement.

Average percent difference between treatment unit and control unit stem density across all post-treatment measurements. This is a weighted average, in which differences during each measurement interval are weighted by the number of years in the measurement interval.
Standard error of average percent difference between treatment and control across all post-treatment measurements.
Range of years over which time-weighted average values are calculated
